wpt_Cmd_Description: Adds a waypoint for a trader at your current location.
wpt_CmdOpt_Pin_Desc: Pins the waypoint to the map, on creation.
wpt_Error_Trader_Not_Found: No traders have been found within range of the player.
wpt_Error_Waypoint_Already_Exists: A waypoint for this trader already exists.
wp_Cmd_Description: Quickly, and easily add waypoints at your current location.
cm_Cmd_Description: Re-centres the map on the given location or player.
cm_ReCentre_On_Position: Re-centring world map at X = {0} Z = {1}
